body:
[Elevator Door]: It's broken... You feel like you should try to talk to the person standing next to it. It seems like they are trying to fix the elevator. 

[1]: [Leave]
title: Start1

body:
[Elevator]: It is finally fixed. You can now enter the elevator. 

[1]: [Enter the elevator] 
[2]: [Leave]
title: Start2

body:
[Elevator]: A dim light illuminates the elevator. It seems like it's going to the 2th floor. Until a loud bang erupts. You feel as if the elevator is falling. Suddently, it stops. You take a step outside, and then... 

[1]: [Leave the elevator]
title: Enter
